name: Domi Words - Words puzzle
description:
Domi Words, the domino of words!
Domi Words is a simple and effective word game.

Each level has its own theme.
Gather the syllables together, and find the words of the theme!
Simple, and extremely SATISFYING!

More than 100 themes to find!
Do not forget the "Clues" option that allows you to get unstuck.

Download "Domi Words" without waiting to start to wake up your brain and test the limits of your vocabulary.

• A super Addictive puzzle
• Helps keep your mind sharp
• Nice feeling to discover a word
• Totally free to download, and play
• It starts easily, and gets rough quickly :)
• More levels available soon

If you like to spend time playing word games, and you're fed up with these sad games, Domi Words will be your perfect companion to take with you wherever you go.
By playing this game, you train your brain, and you improve your vocabulary. The more levels you pass, the more you train your brain! Good luck :)
